subject: 身着金色长裙的女神，眉心有星芒，手持长剑
detail: 2D Chinese anime style, a divine goddess wearing a golden long gown with a star-shaped mark glowing on her forehead and holding a radiant long sword, first the star mark on her forehead glows with soft stardust light, then the blade of the sword illuminates with shimmering silver-white radiance, finally the light expands to gently bathe the towering peak of Lingjian Mountain below, background features a flowing starry river across the cosmic sky, vertical dolly shot ascending smoothly from ground level up to eye level with the floating goddess, high-resolution 8K cinematic framing, sacred and awe-inspiring atmosphere. Background sound: gentle celestial hum with flowing starriver ambience and resonant sword chime. Voiceover says in Chinese "天界女神降临，命运的齿轮开始转动。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山主峰，女神悬浮空中，脚下是山体，背景是星河，高清晰度，8K画质
narration: 天界女神降临，命运的齿轮开始转动。
